translated: The throat cakra is the resting place.

original: phung po khams rnams tshig pa yi //
analyzed: phung po khams rnams tshig pa yi //
translated: The aggregates and constituents are burned.

original: snying gar dga' ba skyed par byed //
analyzed: snying gar dga' ba skyed par byed //
translated: Joy is generated in the heart.

original: de nas lte pa'i padmar gnas //
analyzed: de nas lte pa'i padmar gnas //
translated: Then it abides in the navel lotus.

original: de bzhin slar yang 'gro dang 'ong //
analyzed: de bzhin slar yang 'gro dang 'ong //
translated: In the same way, it goes and comes again.üîΩThe yoga of withdrawal, meditative concentration,üîΩvital energy control, likewise retention,

original: so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang // srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang // rjes dran dang ni ting nge 'dzin //
analyzed: so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang // srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang // rjes dran dang ni ting nge 'dzin //
translated: recollection, and meditative absorption

original: rnal 'byor re rer bsam par bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor re rer bsam par bya //
translated: should be contemplated in each yoga.

original: bstan pa las byung mtshan ma ni //
analyzed: bstan pa las byung mtshan ma ni //
translated: The signs that arise from the teachingüîΩare seen as trembling, vibrating, and so on.

original: 'dar dang 'phar ba sogs mthong nas ;üîΩ/ sems can kun la phan gyur pa'i //
analyzed: 'dar dang 'phar ba sogs mthong nas ; / sems can kun la phan gyur pa'i //
translated: Having seen them,

original: lha nyid 'khor lo spro bar bya //
analyzed: lha nyid 'khor lo spro bar bya //
translated: the deity emanates the wheel for the benefit of all sentient beings.

original: de ltar bsgom zhing myur bar ni //
analyzed: de ltar bsgom zhing myur bar ni //
translated: Meditating in that way,

original: dred sogs rim gyis 'bras bu yi //
analyzed: dred sogs rim gyis 'bras bu yi //
translated: the stages of sloth and so on are the result.

original: rab dga' la sogs sa rnams ni //
analyzed: rab dga' la sogs sa rnams ni //
translated: The stages of Supreme Joy and so on

original: skye ba 'di nyid la thob 'gyur //
analyzed: skye ba 'di nyid la thob 'gyur //
translated: are attained in this very lifetime.

original: de'i rjes su /
analyzed: de'i rjes su /
translated: After that,

original: sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams dang ; / mkha' 'gro ma rnams rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams dang ; / mkha' 'gro ma rnams rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: by the power of the Yoga,üîΩinvite those Mantras

original: gsang sngags de rnams spyan 'dren gyi //üîΩmngon du phyogs par byed phyir dgongs //
analyzed: gsang sngags de rnams spyan 'dren gyi // mngon du phyogs par byed phyir dgongs //
translated: to come and be present.

original: ji ltar 'ga' zhig sems dpa' che'i //
analyzed: ji ltar 'ga' zhig sems dpa' che'i //
translated: Just as someone, through the power of a great being,

original: sgra chen 'o dod 'bod pa ste //
analyzed: sgra chen 'o dod 'bod pa ste //
translated: cries out with a great cry,

original: thos pa tsam gyis byon par 'gyur //
analyzed: thos pa tsam gyis byon par 'gyur //
translated: and by just hearing it, they come,

original: de bzhin sangs rgyas rim par byon //
analyzed: de bzhin sangs rgyas rim par byon //
translated: so the Buddhas come in stages.

original: de nas gsang sngags rgyal po yis //
analyzed: de nas gsang sngags rgyal po yis //
translated: Then, the King of Mantras,

original: sems kyi rdo rje nas bskul bas //
analyzed: sems kyi rdo rje nas bskul bas //
translated: having been invoked from the seed of the mind,

original: dbye bar dka' ba'i sgrub pa ster //
analyzed: dbye bar dka' ba'i sgrub pa ster //
translated: gives the accomplishment that is difficult to separate from.

original: zab mo nam mkha' mthong ba can //
analyzed: zab mo nam mkha' mthong ba can //
translated: The profound one has the vision of space.

original: 'di ltar thub pa'i gsung shes nas //
analyzed: 'di ltar thub pa'i gsung shes nas //
translated: Knowing the speech of the Sage in this way,

original: mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas //üîΩh'um yig bdag @295a * //üîΩnyid can 'byung ba //
analyzed: mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas // h'um yig bdag @295a * // nyid can 'byung ba //
translated: the one in equipoise should recite the Mantra.

original: aom gyi rang bzhin 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: aom gyi rang bzhin 'jug pa'o //
translated: The one who is the nature of the syllable H≈™·πÄ arises.üîΩThe one who is the nature of the syllable O·πÄ enters.

original: gnas pa'i bdag nyid a'a:yig ste //
analyzed: gnas pa'i bdag nyid a'a:yig ste //
translated: The one who is the nature of the syllable A·∏§ abides.

original: srog rnams kyi ni rim par dgongs //
analyzed: srog rnams kyi ni rim par dgongs //
translated: The life-force of all of them should be understood in stages.

original: nyin zhag gcig la rgyu ba'i rlung //
analyzed: nyin zhag gcig la rgyu ba'i rlung //
translated: The wind that moves in one day

original: nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o //
analyzed: nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o //
translated: twenty-one thousand six hundred.

original: rtsa ba'i sngags sogs sngags rnams las //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags sogs sngags rnams las //
translated: The mantrin should recite the root mantra and so forth

original: sngags pas ji ltar 'dod bzhin bzlas //üîΩdung chen phreng ba skud brgyus pa //
analyzed: sngags pas ji ltar 'dod bzhin bzlas // dung chen phreng ba skud brgyus pa //
translated: as much as he wishes.üîΩThe great conch rosary is strung with thread

original: srin lag mthe bong sbyar bas so //
analyzed: srin lag mthe bong sbyar bas so //
translated: and joined with the ring finger and thumb.

original: de'i rjes su phag mo la sogs pa'i lha nyid kyi rnam par mngon par zhen pa'i phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i rjes su phag mo la sogs pa'i lha nyid kyi rnam par mngon par zhen pa'i phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: After that, in order to demonstrate the attainment of omniscience, in order to manifest the deity itself such as VƒÅrƒÅhƒ´ and so forth,

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang sa bcu gnas la sogs pa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang sa bcu gnas la sogs pa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: one should apply the factors of enlightenment, the ten grounds, and so forth.

original: de la gtsang ba bde ba rtag pa bdag gi log shes bzhi'i gnyen po nyid ni /
analyzed: de la gtsang ba bde ba rtag pa bdag gi log shes bzhi'i gnyen po nyid ni /
translated: Therein, the four foundations of mindfulness are the antidote to the four misconceptions of purity, happiness, permanence, and self.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste /
translated: The four foundations of mindfulness are as follows:

original: de la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: de la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
translated: The foundation of mindfulness of the body

original: gzugs kyi phung po'i yongs su shes pa la rab tu gzhol pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po'i yongs su shes pa la rab tu gzhol pa'o //
translated: is directed toward the complete understanding of the aggregate of form.

original: tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
translated: The foundation of mindfulness of feelingüîΩis directed toward the complete understanding of the aggregate of feeling.

original: tshor ba'i phung po yongs su shes pa la gzhol ba'o //üîΩchos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: tshor ba'i phung po yongs su shes pa la gzhol ba'o // chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
translated: The aggregate of feeling is the object of the application of mindfulness of feeling.üîΩThe aggregate of perception is the object of the application of mindfulness of dharma.üîΩThe aggregates of formation and consciousness are the objects of the application of mindfulness of mind.

original: 'du shes dang 'du byed dag sgyu ma lta bur nges par gzung ngo //
analyzed: 'du shes dang 'du byed dag sgyu ma lta bur nges par gzung ngo //
translated: The application of mindfulness of dharma is the determination that perception and formation are like illusions.

original: sems rjes su dran par nye bar gzhag pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i rang bzhin so sor byed pa'o ;
analyzed: sems rjes su dran par nye bar gzhag pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i rang bzhin so sor byed pa'o ;
translated: The application of mindfulness of mind is the discernment of the nature of the aggregate of consciousness.

original: / de la dran pa ni nyams su myong ba'i dngos po la sems mi rmugs pa'o //
analyzed: / de la dran pa ni nyams su myong ba'i dngos po la sems mi rmugs pa'o //
translated: Here, mindfulness is the non-forgetting of the experienced thing by the mind.

original: de nye bar gnas par byed pa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: de nye bar gnas par byed pa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
translated: The special wisdom that establishes that is the application of mindfulness.

original: 'byung ba 'dus pa ni lus so //
analyzed: 'byung ba 'dus pa ni lus so //
translated: The body is the collection of the elements.

original: bde ba la sogs pa nyams su myong ba ni tshor ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa nyams su myong ba ni tshor ba'o //
translated: Feeling is the experience of pleasure, etc.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni chos so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni chos so //
translated: Dharma is the limit of reality.

original: so sor snang ba tsam ni sems so //
analyzed: so sor snang ba tsam ni sems so //
translated: Mind is mere individual appearance.

original: 'di rnams la sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyis rjes su dran pa nyid ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams la sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyis rjes su dran pa nyid ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
translated: The mindfulness of these as being like illusions is the application of mindfulness.

original: rdzu 'phrul ni ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul ni ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: Supernatural power is the perfection of concentration.

original: de'i yan lag rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: de'i yan lag rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o //
translated: Its members are the four bases of supernatural power.

original: de la dam pa'i chos thos pa la sogs pa'i mngon par zhen pa shin tu dang ba ni 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
analyzed: de la dam pa'i chos thos pa la sogs pa'i mngon par zhen pa shin tu dang ba ni 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
translated: Among them, the base of supernatural power of will is the clarity of firm aspiration for hearing the true Dharma, etc.

original: brtson 'grus la rgyun ma chad par goms pa ni brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus la rgyun ma chad par goms pa ni brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
translated: The base of supernatural power of effort is the continuous practice of effort.üîΩThe base of supernatural power of mind is the investigation of the Dharma.

original: shin tu rnam par dpyod pa ni dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba'o //üîΩbyang chub nyid ni mngon sum du byed pa la khyad @295b par du 'phags pa ni /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dpyod pa ni dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba'o // byang chub nyid ni mngon sum du byed pa la khyad @295b par du 'phags pa ni /
translated: The base of supernatural power of examination is the examination of the Dharma.

original: sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
translated: The base of supernatural power of the mind is the special realization of enlightenment itself.

original: yang na spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa dben pa 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa rnams la brten pa dang rnam par bral ba yongs su gyur pa lhag par mos pa'i bsam pa ni 'dun pa ste de la bden pa dang ni lam mo //
analyzed: yang na spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa dben pa 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa rnams la brten pa dang rnam par bral ba yongs su gyur pa lhag par mos pa'i bsam pa ni 'dun pa ste de la bden pa dang ni lam mo //
translated: Or else, the intention of superior resolve is aspiration, which is based on the foundations of seclusion, freedom from passion, and cessation, and is free from attachment, and is the transformation of the will to abandon the motivating factors.

original: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba ste mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba ste mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: Freedom from passion is nirvana, which is the abandonment of the obscurations of the passions.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po'i sbyor ba dang bral ba ni 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po'i sbyor ba dang bral ba ni 'gog pa'o //
translated: Cessation is the freedom from attachment to things with outflows.

original: 'di rnams la brten pa ni dben pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa la brten pa'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams la brten pa ni dben pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa la brten pa'o //
translated: Based on these is seclusion, freedom from passion, and cessation.

original: rnam par bral ba ni 'dus byas pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi sbyor ba dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par bral ba ni 'dus byas pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi sbyor ba dang bral ba'o //
translated: Freedom is the freedom from attachment to all things with outflows.

original: de yongs su gyur pa ni de'i rgyu mthun pa'o //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa ni de'i rgyu mthun pa'o //
translated: The transformation of that is its natural outcome.

original: de bzhin du brtson 'grus sems dpyod pa rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin du brtson 'grus sems dpyod pa rnams so //
translated: Similarly, effort, mind, and investigation are also like that.

original: 'di la shes pas dbang byed pa'i phyir mig la sogs pa bzhin du dad pa la sogs pa yang dbang po ste /
analyzed: 'di la shes pas dbang byed pa'i phyir mig la sogs pa bzhin du dad pa la sogs pa yang dbang po ste /
translated: Faith, vigor, mindfulness, concentration, and wisdom are roots because they are the roots of the wholesome.

original: de la bden pa dang dkon mchog dang las 'bras rnams la mngon par yid ches pa ni dad pa ste dbang po'o //
analyzed: de la bden pa dang dkon mchog dang las 'bras rnams la mngon par yid ches pa ni dad pa ste dbang po'o //
translated: Faith is the root of the wholesome because it is the cause of the arising of the wholesome.

original: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni nges par bya ba nyid kyis nges par gzung ba'o //üîΩdran pa'i dbang po ni mi rmugs pa'i dran pa nyid kyis ma rig pa'i skabs med pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni nges par bya ba nyid kyis nges par gzung ba'o // dran pa'i dbang po ni mi rmugs pa'i dran pa nyid kyis ma rig pa'i skabs med pa'o //
translated: Vigor is the root of the wholesome because it is the cause of the increase of the wholesome.üîΩMindfulness is the root of the wholesome because it is the cause of the non-loss of the wholesome.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni sems rtse gcig pa la dbang phyug pa nyid do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni sems rtse gcig pa la dbang phyug pa nyid do //
translated: Concentration is the root of the wholesome because it is the cause of the non-distraction of the wholesome.

original: shes rab kyi dbang po ni spang bya dang blad bya dag la de nyid du nges par gzung ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi dbang po ni spang bya dang blad bya dag la de nyid du nges par gzung ba'o //
translated: Wisdom is the root of the wholesome because it is the cause of the penetration of the wholesome.

original: yang na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la sems rab tu dang ba ni dad pa'o //
analyzed: yang na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la sems rab tu dang ba ni dad pa'o //
translated: Or else, faith is the clarity of mind with regard to the truths, the jewels, and action and its results.

original: sems mngon par spro ba ni brtson 'grus so ;
analyzed: sems mngon par spro ba ni brtson 'grus so ;
translated: Vigor is the inclination of mind toward the wholesome.üîΩMindfulness is the non-loss of the object by the mind.üîΩConcentration is the one-pointedness of the mind.üîΩWisdom is the discernment of phenomena.

original: / dad pa'i dbang po la brten pa'i chos rnams gang gis nye bar sogs par byed pa ni /
analyzed: / dad pa'i dbang po la brten pa'i chos rnams gang gis nye bar sogs par byed pa ni /
translated: The dharmas that are based on the faculty of faith are what is nourished.üîΩ

original: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o //üîΩbrtson 'grus kyi dbang pos bskyed pa'i don la mi rmugs pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o // brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos bskyed pa'i don la mi rmugs pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: The faculty of effort is that which causes the dharmas based on the faculty of faith to increase.üîΩThe faculty of mindfulness is that which causes the meaning generated by the faculty of effort not to be confused.

original: dran pa'i dbang po las don ma nyams pa rnams gang gis mngon du phyogs par byed pa de ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o //
analyzed: dran pa'i dbang po las don ma nyams pa rnams gang gis mngon du phyogs par byed pa de ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o //
translated: The faculty of concentration is that which causes the meaning not to deteriorate due to the faculty of mindfulness to be directed.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byas pa'i don rnams kyis rnam par 'byed pa de shes rab kyi dbang po'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byas pa'i don rnams kyis rnam par 'byed pa de shes rab kyi dbang po'o //
translated: The faculty of wisdom is that which analyzes the meaning made one-pointed by the faculty of concentration.

original: ma dang pa le lo rab tu rmugs pa dang bag med pa dang rnam par g-yang pa la sogs pa'i gnyen po @296a * //
analyzed: ma dang pa le lo rab tu rmugs pa dang bag med pa dang rnam par g-yang pa la sogs pa'i gnyen po @296a * //
translated: The faculties of faith, effort, mindfulness, concentration, and wisdom are antidotes to nonfaith, laziness, forgetfulness, distraction, and ignorance, respectively.

original: mthar thug pa'i dbang po rnams kho na stobs dag ste /
analyzed: mthar thug pa'i dbang po rnams kho na stobs dag ste /
translated: The faculties are called powers because they are the final stage of the faculties.

original: dad pa'i stobs brtson 'grus kyi stobs dran pa'i stobs ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang shes rab kyi stobs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dad pa'i stobs brtson 'grus kyi stobs dran pa'i stobs ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang shes rab kyi stobs zhes bya'o //
translated: The power of faith, the power of effort, the power of mindfulness, the power of concentration, and the power of wisdom.

original: rang nyid kho nas yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir yang dag byang chub ste /
analyzed: rang nyid kho nas yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir yang dag byang chub ste /
translated: It is perfect enlightenment because it is realized by oneself alone.

original: som nyi dang bral ba'i sems so ;
analyzed: som nyi dang bral ba'i sems so ;
translated: It is the mind free from doubt.üîΩIts cause is the seven factors of perfect enlightenment.üîΩThe factor of perfect enlightenment of correct mindfulness is the non-forgetting of the object of meditation by the mind.

original: / de'i rgyu ni yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te de la sems can kun gyi don bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: / de'i rgyu ni yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te de la sems can kun gyi don bya ba'i phyir /
translated: The factor of perfect enlightenment of correct discrimination of phenomena is the discrimination of phenomena by the mind that is not forgetful of the object of meditation.üîΩThe factor of perfect enlightenment of correct effort is the mind that is not forgetful of the object of meditation and is endowed with the discrimination of phenomena, and is applied to the relinquishment of laxity and the excitation of mind.üîΩThe factor of perfect enlightenment of correct joy is the joy of the mind that is not forgetful of the object of meditation, is endowed with the discrimination of phenomena, and is applied to the relinquishment of laxity and excitation.

original: yang dag pa'i byang chub la smon lam dad thos pa dang rtog pa khong du chud pa la mi rmugs pa ni ngan pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //üîΩchos can bdag la sogs pa yod pa ma yin pa dang / chos kyi phung po lnga la sogs pa kho na yod pa zhes //üîΩgang chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa de ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i byang chub la smon lam dad thos pa dang rtog pa khong du chud pa la mi rmugs pa ni ngan pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go // chos can bdag la sogs pa yod pa ma yin pa dang / chos kyi phung po lnga la sogs pa kho na yod pa zhes // gang chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa de ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: The factor of perfect enlightenment of correct pliancy is the pliancy of the mind that is not forgetful of the object of meditation, is endowed with the discrimination of phenomena, and is applied to the relinquishment of laxity and excitation.üîΩThe factor of perfect enlightenment of correct concentration is the one-pointedness of the mind that is not forgetful of the object of meditation, is endowed with the discrimination of phenomena, and is applied to the relinquishment of laxity and excitation.

original: yid chos nyid dang ro gcig pa na dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: yid chos nyid dang ro gcig pa na dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: The factor of perfect enlightenment of correct equanimity is the mind that is not forgetful of the object of meditation, is endowed with the discrimination of phenomena, and is applied to the relinquishment of laxity and excitation, and is free from attachment to joy.

original: dga' ba mi mthun pa bdag dang bdag gi ba'i bag chags bcad pa'i phyir /üîΩlus ngag yid gsum las su rung ba nyid ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: dga' ba mi mthun pa bdag dang bdag gi ba'i bag chags bcad pa'i phyir / lus ngag yid gsum las su rung ba nyid ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: The limb of enlightenment that is serenity is the pliancy of the three, body, speech, and mind, in order to cut off the instincts for the disagreeable and for the notions of ‚ÄúI‚Äù and ‚Äúmine.‚ÄùüîΩ

original: tshad med pa bzhi ni de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings rnams la rtse gcig pa ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //üîΩso so skye bo'i sa las nges par 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi ni de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings rnams la rtse gcig pa ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go // so so skye bo'i sa las nges par 'byung ba ni /
translated: The limb of enlightenment that is correct concentration is the one-pointedness of the three doors of body, speech, and mind in the suchness, reality limit, emptiness, and dharma-dhƒÅtu.

original: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: The limb of enlightenment that is correct effort is the effort to emerge from the stage of ordinary beings.

original: nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por gyur pa dang ma gyur pa nyid kyis lus ngag yid gsum gyi 'du byed rnams kyi 'bad rtsol med pa'i rgyud dang btang snyoms mi byed pa dag ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por gyur pa dang ma gyur pa nyid kyis lus ngag yid gsum gyi 'du byed rnams kyi 'bad rtsol med pa'i rgyud dang btang snyoms mi byed pa dag ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: The limb of enlightenment that is correct equanimity is the non-forgetfulness of the antidotes to the afflictions and the non-abandonment of the effort of the formative forces of body, speech, and mind that are the causes of the absence of effort.

original: sdig pa kho na'i rjes su mthun pa nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gyur pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: sdig pa kho na'i rjes su mthun pa nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gyur pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: It is the noble path because it is the antidote to the afflictive obstructions, which are only in accord with sin.

original: 'phags pa yang yin la yan lag brgyad pa yang yin pas 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa ste /üîΩshes bya'i sgrib pa spong ba bsgom pa'i ched du tshol bas lam 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyang yin la lam yang yin pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do //
analyzed: 'phags pa yang yin la yan lag brgyad pa yang yin pas 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa ste / shes bya'i sgrib pa spong ba bsgom pa'i ched du tshol bas lam 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyang yin la lam yang yin pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do //
translated: It is the eightfold path because it is the noble path and it has eight members.üîΩIt is the noble path because it is the noble path and it is the path.

original: de'i yan lag rnams ni yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs brgyad de /
analyzed: de'i yan lag rnams ni yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs brgyad de /
translated: Its members are the eight, right view and so on.

original: de la yang dag pa'i lta ba ni chos thams cad bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid can dang 'jig rten @296b pha rol tu lta ba'o //
analyzed: de la yang dag pa'i lta ba ni chos thams cad bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid can dang 'jig rten @296b pha rol tu lta ba'o //
translated: Among them, right view is the view of the world and the world beyond, which has the characteristic of the selflessness of all phenomena.

original: yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni spang bya dang / blang bya nye bar len pa dag gis spang ba dang // mngon sum du bya bar yid la byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni spang bya dang / blang bya nye bar len pa dag gis spang ba dang // mngon sum du bya bar yid la byed pa'o //
translated: Right thought is the mental attention to the objects to be abandoned and to be adopted, in order to abandon and to actualize them.

original: dge ba'i sems dpa' zhig gis sems can mi slu bar byed pa'i dag ni yang dag pa'i dag go //
analyzed: dge ba'i sems dpa' zhig gis sems can mi slu bar byed pa'i dag ni yang dag pa'i dag go //
translated: The right thought of the heroic being is the thought of not deceiving sentient beings.

original: dge ba bcu las mi 'da' bar bya ba ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o //
analyzed: dge ba bcu las mi 'da' bar bya ba ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o //
translated: The right action is not to transgress the ten virtues.

original: sems can la tshul chos pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis 'tsho ba ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o //
analyzed: sems can la tshul chos pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis 'tsho ba ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o //
translated: The right livelihood is to live by the way of life of not cheating sentient beings and so forth.

original: rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rjes su 'brel pa lus ngag yid kyi las ni yang dag pa'i stsol ba'o //
analyzed: rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rjes su 'brel pa lus ngag yid kyi las ni yang dag pa'i stsol ba'o //
translated: The right effort is the action of body, speech, and mind that is connected with the perfection of one's own and others' goals.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i chos nyid ma rmugs pa nyid ni yang dag pa'i dran pa'o //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i chos nyid ma rmugs pa nyid ni yang dag pa'i dran pa'o //
translated: The right mindfulness is the non-forgetfulness of the reality that is realized as it is.

original: dpal he ru ka'i tshul du dmigs pa ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i tshul du dmigs pa ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: The right samadhi is the visualization in the manner of glorious Heruka.

original: 'di rnams kyis sgrib pa rnams spong bar byed pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams so //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis sgrib pa rnams spong bar byed pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams so //
translated: These are the right efforts because they eliminate the obscurations.

original: de la sgrib pa rnams ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / snyom las la sogs pa'i nye bar nyon mongs pa rnams so //
analyzed: de la sgrib pa rnams ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / snyom las la sogs pa'i nye bar nyon mongs pa rnams so //
translated: The obscurations are the afflictions such as passion, and the secondary afflictions such as laziness.

original: gang gi phyir 'di rnams spangs na yang dag par spong ba de'i phyir tha mar rgyas par bshad do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di rnams spangs na yang dag par spong ba de'i phyir tha mar rgyas par bshad do //
translated: Since they are abandoned by the perfect abandonings, they are explained in detail at the end.

original: yang na thams cad du 'di rnams nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yang na thams cad du 'di rnams nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir /
translated: Or, because they are applied everywhere,

original: tha mar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun par bshad de /
analyzed: tha mar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun par bshad de /
translated: they are explained at the end as incompatible with the perfection of wisdom.

original: ji srid rnal 'byor pa he ru kar ma gyur pa de srid du 'di rnams kho nas rtag tu spyod do zhes shes par bya ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: ji srid rnal 'byor pa he ru kar ma gyur pa de srid du 'di rnams kho nas rtag tu spyod do zhes shes par bya ba'i don du'o //
translated: One should understand that as long as the yogi has not become Heruka, he always practices with just these.

original: yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin yang 'grel bar gsal lo //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin yang 'grel bar gsal lo //
translated: The nature of the perfect abandonings is clear in the commentary.

original: sa bcu'i rnam par dag pas gnas la sogs pa bcur brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sa bcu'i rnam par dag pas gnas la sogs pa bcur brjod par bya'o //
translated: The ten, beginning with the abode, should be stated as the purities of the ten stages.

original: de la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa ni rim pas /
analyzed: de la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa ni rim pas /
translated: Therein, the abode, the near abode, and so on, in order,

original: rab dga' dri med 'od byed pa //
analyzed: rab dga' dri med 'od byed pa //
translated: are Joy, Stainless, Shining,

original: 'od 'phro sbyangs dka' mngon du gyur //
analyzed: 'od 'phro sbyangs dka' mngon du gyur //
translated: Radiating light, difficult to purify, manifest.

original: ring du song dang mi g-yo ba //
analyzed: ring du song dang mi g-yo ba //
translated: Gone far, immovable,

original: legs pa'i blo gros chos sprin ni //
analyzed: legs pa'i blo gros chos sprin ni //
translated: excellent intelligence, cloud of Dharma.

original: p'u dz'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di la man ngag ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: p'u dz'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di la man ngag ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The instruction here is as follows:

original: p'um dz'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad thig le dang bcas pa bltas shing p'um yig la sogs pa'i yi ge yongs su gyur pa rtsibs med pa'i 'khor lo'i rnam pa gnas la sogs pa'i gnas rnams mgo nas brtsams te skad cig tu blta bar bya'oüîΩ// de gnas la sogs pa rnams la de dang de'i gnas kyi rtsa @297a * //
analyzed: p'um dz'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad thig le dang bcas pa bltas shing p'um yig la sogs pa'i yi ge yongs su gyur pa rtsibs med pa'i 'khor lo'i rnam pa gnas la sogs pa'i gnas rnams mgo nas brtsams te skad cig tu blta bar bya'o // de gnas la sogs pa rnams la de dang de'i gnas kyi rtsa @297a * //
translated: All of this, beginning with ‚Äúp≈´jƒÅ,‚Äù and so on, is seen with a drop. The syllables of the p≈´·πÉ syllable, and so on, transform into the form of a wheel without spokes. Beginning from the head, one should see the places of the abodes, and so on, in an instant.

original: rnams ni de dang de'i lha nyid kyi tshul du yongs su gyur nas lhar gnas pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rnams ni de dang de'i lha nyid kyi tshul du yongs su gyur nas lhar gnas pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of those places, and so on, transform into the nature of those deities and should be contemplated as abiding as deities.

original: rna ba zhes pa ni rna ba'i bu ga'i nang du'o //
analyzed: rna ba zhes pa ni rna ba'i bu ga'i nang du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe ears‚Äù are inside the ear holes.

original: de bzhin lte ba mtshan ma bshang lam smin ma'i dbus mig sna rnams la yang go bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin lte ba mtshan ma bshang lam smin ma'i dbus mig sna rnams la yang go bar bya'o //
translated: One should understand the navel, the secret place, the anus, the point between the eyebrows, the eyes, and the nose in the same way.

original: ji ltar phyi rol du gnas la sogs pa'i nye bar gnas pa'i chu bo rnams kyi chab kyis gnas la sogs pa gso bar byed pa de bzhin du lus la yang rtsa rnams kyi sen mo la sogs pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir phyi dang mnyam pa nyid do
analyzed: ji ltar phyi rol du gnas la sogs pa'i nye bar gnas pa'i chu bo rnams kyi chab kyis gnas la sogs pa gso bar byed pa de bzhin du lus la yang rtsa rnams kyi sen mo la sogs pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir phyi dang mnyam pa nyid do
translated: Just as the rivers Ganges, etc., which flow externally, nourish the places, etc., so also in the body, the channels nourish the nails, etc., and are thus equal to the external ones.

original: // phyi rol du rdo rje'i gnas ni byang chub chen po'i ming can gyi gnas dang / chu bo nee ranydza na'o //
analyzed: // phyi rol du rdo rje'i gnas ni byang chub chen po'i ming can gyi gnas dang / chu bo nee ranydza na'o //
translated: Externally, the vajra-places are the places called Great Awakening, and the river is the Naira√±janƒÅ.

original: lus la bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rdo rje'i gnas te /
analyzed: lus la bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rdo rje'i gnas te /
translated: In the body, the great-bliss chakra is the vajra-place.

original: dbu ma ni nee ranydza na'o //
analyzed: dbu ma ni nee ranydza na'o //
translated: The central channel is the Naira√±janƒÅ.

original: 'di ltar tshangs pa'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo brtan par mos par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar tshangs pa'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo brtan par mos par bya'o //
translated: Thus one should imagine the firm mandala-wheel of the Brahma-body.

original: sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar gsungs pa kho na'i mjug bsdu ba yin te de la mtho ris la sogs pa rnams dang dbyir mi phyed pa'i lus su 'gyur te /
analyzed: sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar gsungs pa kho na'i mjug bsdu ba yin te de la mtho ris la sogs pa rnams dang dbyir mi phyed pa'i lus su 'gyur te /
translated: The body, etc., is a summary of what was said before. There, the body becomes inseparable from the heavens, etc.

original: sku gsung thugs dang mtho ris mi yul sa 'og ces bya ba nad dang phyi dang rang bzhin gcig tu 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs dang mtho ris mi yul sa 'og ces bya ba nad dang phyi dang rang bzhin gcig tu 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Body, speech, mind, heaven, human world, and underworld‚Äîall are of one nature.üîΩThe seed is the three syllables.

original: sa bon brjod de yi ge gsum gyi rang bzhin las zhes bya ni yi ge gsum las n'a da yongs su gyur pa'i sgo nas gang h'um rang gi ngo bo bskyed pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: sa bon brjod de yi ge gsum gyi rang bzhin las zhes bya ni yi ge gsum las n'a da yongs su gyur pa'i sgo nas gang h'um rang gi ngo bo bskyed pa de de bzhin no //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúfrom the nature‚Äù is that the generation of the essence of the syllable h≈´·πÉ from the three syllables by way of the complete transformation of the nƒÅda is just like that.

original: rgyu de las lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyu de las lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúby the method of innate joy‚Äù is from that cause.

original: skad cig la sogs pa ni phyag mtshan la sogs pa la ma ltos par lha mo dang lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig la sogs pa ni phyag mtshan la sogs pa la ma ltos par lha mo dang lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The instant and so forth are not dependent on the hand implement and so forth, because they are innate with the goddess.

original: skad cig phyag rgya zhes pa ni /
analyzed: skad cig phyag rgya zhes pa ni /
translated: The instant is the consort.

original: rang dang dus mnyam pa kho nar shes rab dang sbyor ba'o//
analyzed: rang dang dus mnyam pa kho nar shes rab dang sbyor ba'o//
translated: One should understand that the instant is the union with the wisdom consort.

original: skad cig dkyil 'khor lo zhes pa ni /
analyzed: skad cig dkyil 'khor lo zhes pa ni /
translated: The instant is the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: gzhal yas khang dang dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams dang lhan cig tu dus skad cig la rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang dang dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams dang lhan cig tu dus skad cig la rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the celestial mansion and the heroines of the heroes are completed in an instant.

original: skad cig gis ni gsang sngags zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa dang dus mnyam du aom a'a:zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags brjod do ;
analyzed: skad cig gis ni gsang sngags zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa dang dus mnyam du aom a'a:zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags brjod do ;
translated: The mantra is the recitation of the mantra om a·∏• and so forth, simultaneous with the generation.

original: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdor bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ste /
analyzed: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdor bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ste /
translated: Then, etc. is a summary verse.

original: de nas ni de ma thag tu ye shes kyi 'khor lo rnam par bsgoms te 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho ga ste /
analyzed: de nas ni de ma thag tu ye shes kyi 'khor lo rnam par bsgoms te 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho ga ste /
translated: Then means immediately after the contemplation of the wisdom wheel, the rite which will be explained.

original: ci byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci byas nas she na /
translated: What is done?

original: de la gsungs pa cho ga gnyis shes nas so //
analyzed: de la gsungs pa cho ga gnyis shes nas so //
translated: It is said, having known the two rites.

original: go cha gnyis kyis lha rnams @297b dang lag pa'i mchod pa dang khyad par med do //
analyzed: go cha gnyis kyis lha rnams @297b dang lag pa'i mchod pa dang khyad par med do //
translated: The two armors are the same as the deities.

original: pags pa'i nang du gnas pa'i rdul phra rab de sngags kyi rang bzhin nam lha'i rang bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: pags pa'i nang du gnas pa'i rdul phra rab de sngags kyi rang bzhin nam lha'i rang bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
translated: The atoms located in the skin should be seen as having the nature of mantra or the nature of deity.

original: myur zhugs zhes bya ba ni aargha la sogs pa la ma ltos par ro //
analyzed: myur zhugs zhes bya ba ni aargha la sogs pa la ma ltos par ro //
translated: The swift entry is without regard to the argha, etc.

original: go cha gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rgyas par bshad pa'o //üîΩsnying gar nyi gnas zhes pa ni thugs kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i rang bzhin h'um yig bsgoms nas de'i 'od zer rnams kyis bkug pa'i ye shes sems dpa' la pi wang 'dzin pa la sogs pa sngar gsungs pa'i lha mo bcu drugüîΩgis mchod nas 'khor lo sdom pa'i rnal 'byor pa des dam tshig gi 'khor lo rab tu gzhug go //
analyzed: go cha gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rgyas par bshad pa'o // snying gar nyi gnas zhes pa ni thugs kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i rang bzhin h'um yig bsgoms nas de'i 'od zer rnams kyis bkug pa'i ye shes sems dpa' la pi wang 'dzin pa la sogs pa sngar gsungs pa'i lha mo bcu drug gis mchod nas 'khor lo sdom pa'i rnal 'byor pa des dam tshig gi 'khor lo rab tu gzhug go //
translated: The two armors, etc., are the extensive explanation.üîΩThe sun-abiding at the heart is the meditation on the syllable hum, which is the nature of the samadhi being, on the sun mandala of the mind. Having summoned the gnosis being with the light rays from that, the yogin of Chakrasamvara should enter the commitment wheel, having worshipped with the sixteen goddesses previously mentioned, such as the one holding a lute, etc.

original: de nas de'i rjes su rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang ba'i thod pa dang da ma ru 'dzin pa snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i pi wang ma la sogs lha mo bcu drug gis mchod nas cung zad gzhol bar byas
analyzed: de nas de'i rjes su rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang ba'i thod pa dang da ma ru 'dzin pa snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i pi wang ma la sogs lha mo bcu drug gis mchod nas cung zad gzhol bar byas
translated: Then, after that, the yogin of Chakrasamvara should slightly bow to the gnosis wheel, having worshipped with the sixteen goddesses such as the one holding a lute, etc., who arise from the seed at the heart, holding skull cups filled with the elixir of gnosis and damarus, and the yogin should enter the gnosis wheel, having worshipped with the sixteen goddesses such as the one holding a lute, etc., who arise from the seed at the heart, holding skull cups filled with the elixir of gnosis and damarus, and the yogin should enter the gnosis wheel, having worshipped with the sixteen goddesses such as the one holding a lute, etc., who arise from the seed at the heart, holding skull cups filled with the elixir of gnosis and damarus.

original: pa'i thod pa'i bdud rtsis bdag nyid las dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: pa'i thod pa'i bdud rtsis bdag nyid las dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: One should confer empowerment on oneself with the nectar in the skull.

original: de'i dus su yang shin tu bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsam par bya ste lhag ma go sla'o //
analyzed: de'i dus su yang shin tu bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsam par bya ste lhag ma go sla'o //
translated: At that time, one should also contemplate oneself as having the nature of great bliss. The rest is easy to understand.

original: de'i rjes su ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can du blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes su ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can du blta bar bya ste /
translated: After that, one should view oneself as having the nature of the three bodies, which are the nature of the five wisdoms.

original: de la gang zag dang chos kyi bdag med pas nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par spangs nas sgro 'dogs thams cad kyi spros pa'i rlung spangs pas dri ma med pa'i snang gsal rlung gis ma bskyod pa'i rgyun bzhin du shin tu 'od gsal ba'i
analyzed: de la gang zag dang chos kyi bdag med pas nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par spangs nas sgro 'dogs thams cad kyi spros pa'i rlung spangs pas dri ma med pa'i snang gsal rlung gis ma bskyod pa'i rgyun bzhin du shin tu 'od gsal ba'i
translated: There, having abandoned the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience by means of the selflessness of persons and phenomena, the wind of all the proliferations of superimposition is abandoned. Therefore, like a stream of stainless light that is not moved by the wind, one should view oneself as having the nature of the five wisdoms.

original: ye shes kyi sgron ma me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ming can //
analyzed: ye shes kyi sgron ma me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ming can //
translated: The lamp of wisdom, which is extremely clear, is called the mirror-like wisdom.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa rang nye bar sbyor ba'i ye shes rab tu gsal ba /
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa rang nye bar sbyor ba'i ye shes rab tu gsal ba /
translated: The wisdom that is applied to the ultimate truth is very clear.

original: 'khor ba gnas pa'i bar du rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul gyis rab tu gnas te rnam par dag pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du don thams cad phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba gnas pa'i bar du rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul gyis rab tu gnas te rnam par dag pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du don thams cad phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o //
translated: Until the end of cyclic existence, it is present in the manner of nonabiding nirvana, and like a pure wish fulfilling gem, it brings about the perfection of all aims.

original: des byin gyis brlabs pa las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la sogs pa gsum kun rdzob kyi bden pa la dmigs pa'i gzhan don la nges par sbyor ba ste /üîΩgang gi dbang thun mong dang khyad par dag gis so sor brtags nas rang rang gi lta ba bzhin du bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes @298a * //
analyzed: des byin gyis brlabs pa las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la sogs pa gsum kun rdzob kyi bden pa la dmigs pa'i gzhan don la nges par sbyor ba ste / gang gi dbang thun mong dang khyad par dag gis so sor brtags nas rang rang gi lta ba bzhin du bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes @298a * //
translated: The three beginning with the gnosis of equality are definitely applied to the benefit of others, focusing on the conventional truth, and they are empowered by that.

original: kyis sems can thams cad gdul byar rung ba bzhin du dgod par byed do //
analyzed: kyis sems can thams cad gdul byar rung ba bzhin du dgod par byed do //
translated: The gnosis of thorough investigation is the gnosis of practice, through which all sentient beings are established in accordance with their view, through the common and special powers of the buddhas.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos po thams cad la mi rtag pa la sogs pha thun mong gi rnam pas des par spyod do /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos po thams cad la mi rtag pa la sogs pha thun mong gi rnam pas des par spyod do /
translated: The gnosis of equality is the practice of all things through the common aspects of impermanence and so on.

original: yul dus gnas skabs kyi sgo nas kyang don gyi bya ba yang thun mong gi nges pas sems par byed do //
analyzed: yul dus gnas skabs kyi sgo nas kyang don gyi bya ba yang thun mong gi nges pas sems par byed do //
translated: And by way of place, time, and occasion, one also thinks about the matter by means of a common determination.

original: 'di ltar nges par spyad nas bye brag gi tshul gyis so sor rtog ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar nges par spyad nas bye brag gi tshul gyis so sor rtog ste /
translated: Having thus determined, one discriminates by way of the specific modes.

original: gang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'am /
analyzed: gang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'am /
translated: If the roots of virtue are fully matured,üîΩor if the collection of faith, etc., is manifest, then one attains liberation just at that time.

original: dad pa la sogs pa'i tshogs mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ba de'i cho kho nar thar pa thob pa'am zhes 'di ltar thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa 'di ye shes gsum mo //
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa'i tshogs mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ba de'i cho kho nar thar pa thob pa'am zhes 'di ltar thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa 'di ye shes gsum mo //
translated: Thus, this is the three knowledges which accomplish the aim of all.

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yang shin tu rnam par dag pas yongs su gyur pas ni me long lta bu'i ye shes su brjod do //
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yang shin tu rnam par dag pas yongs su gyur pas ni me long lta bu'i ye shes su brjod do //
translated: The store-consciousness, moreover, is said to be mirror-knowledge, because it is transformed by the extreme purity of the transformation.

original: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid yongs su gyur pa la bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa dang bral bas shin tu rnam par dag pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid yongs su gyur pa la bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa dang bral bas shin tu rnam par dag pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su 'gyur ro //
translated: The afflicted mind, which is transformed, becomes the knowledge of equality, because it is extremely pure, being free from the view of self, etc.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su gyur pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes su brjod do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su gyur pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes su brjod do //
translated: The transformation of the mental consciousness is called the ‚Äúdiscerning intuition. ‚Äù

original: rab tu 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dbang po las byung ba yongs su gyur pa yang bya ba nan tan du brjod do //
analyzed: rab tu 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dbang po las byung ba yongs su gyur pa yang bya ba nan tan du brjod do //
translated: The transformation of the sense consciousnesses, which arise from the senses, is called the ‚Äúintuition of accomplishment of deeds. ‚Äù

original: rten thams cad yongs su gyur pas kyang thub pa'i khyab pa nyid thob po ;
analyzed: rten thams cad yongs su gyur pas kyang thub pa'i khyab pa nyid thob po ;
translated: And the transformation of all the bases is the attainment of the Sage‚Äôs pervasion.

original: /'di la yang sgro 'dogs pa thams cad kyis dben pas shin tu rnam par shes pa chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pas me long lta bu'i ye shes ni chos sku'o //
analyzed: /'di la yang sgro 'dogs pa thams cad kyis dben pas shin tu rnam par shes pa chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pas me long lta bu'i ye shes ni chos sku'o //
translated: Here, the mirror intuition is the reality body, since it is the intuition of the reality realm, utterly nonconceptual, and devoid of all conceptual proliferations.

original: mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dag ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dag ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: The equality and discerning intuitions are the beatific body,

original: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni sprul pa'i sku ste /
analyzed: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni sprul pa'i sku ste /
translated: and the accomplishing intuition is the emanation body,

original: sngon du so sor brtags nas sems can gyi bya ba la gshegs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon du so sor brtags nas sems can gyi bya ba la gshegs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it proceeds to accomplish the work of beings after discerning them.

original: de'i dbang gis gzhan rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dbang gis gzhan rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And it is because of that that the activity of the Buddha appears to others.

original: skye ba la sogs par ston pa yang sems can yongs su smin pa'i ched du ste /
analyzed: skye ba la sogs par ston pa yang sems can yongs su smin pa'i ched du ste /
translated: The teaching of birth, etc. is for the sake of ripening sentient beings.

original: mi yin pas kyang 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob ces bya ba nges pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: mi yin pas kyang 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob ces bya ba nges pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it generates certainty, thinking, Even a human being can attain such perfection.

original: des nye bar bstan pa'i lam yang bsam pa la sogs pa'i rim pas bsgom zhing grol ba thob bo //
analyzed: des nye bar bstan pa'i lam yang bsam pa la sogs pa'i rim pas bsgom zhing grol ba thob bo //
translated: And they cultivate the path revealed by him through the stages of thought, etc. and attain liberation.

original: gzhan rnams kyang de'i lam du 'jug go //
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyang de'i lam du 'jug go //
translated: And others enter his path.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes ni zhes pa yang go bar @298b bya'o //üîΩkhanda ka p'a la zhes pa ni sen mo dang so la sogs pa khanda ka p'a la la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du go bar bya'o //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes ni zhes pa yang go bar @298b bya'o // khanda ka p'a la zhes pa ni sen mo dang so la sogs pa khanda ka p'a la la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du go bar bya'o //
translated: The knowledge of the extremely pure realm of reality should also be understood in the same way.

original: bla ma dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa mthong na sdom pa nyid du mos pas phyag la sogs pa bya'o zhes bya ba shin tu rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: bla ma dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa mthong na sdom pa nyid du mos pas phyag la sogs pa bya'o zhes bya ba shin tu rnal 'byor ro //
translated: When seeing the guru, the Buddha, etc., one should make prostrations, etc. with the conviction of the vows. This is the extremely clear yoga.

original: da ni rnal 'byor chen po brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni rnal 'byor chen po brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the great yoga should be stated.

original: a'a li k'a li zhes bya ba la sogs te /üîΩa'a li k'a li gnyis 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa las 'khor lo gsum gyi lha nyid kyi tshogs spros pa brjod cing sna bug g-yas pa'i rlung dang bcas pa 'thon nas 'gro ba 'khor lo gsum gyi rang bzhin du byas te thog ma med pa nas grub
analyzed: a'a li k'a li zhes bya ba la sogs te / a'a li k'a li gnyis 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa las 'khor lo gsum gyi lha nyid kyi tshogs spros pa brjod cing sna bug g-yas pa'i rlung dang bcas pa 'thon nas 'gro ba 'khor lo gsum gyi rang bzhin du byas te thog ma med pa nas grub
translated: The Alikali and so forth.

original: pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams ro mnyam du gyur pas //
analyzed: pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams ro mnyam du gyur pas //
translated: The two Alikali, endowed with five light rays, emit the hosts of deities of the three wheels, and having expressed that, they emerge together with the wind of the right nostril, and having made the world the nature of the three wheels, they become of equal taste with the heroes and yoginis who have existed since beginningless time.

original: sna bug g-yon du rab tu zhugs nas lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du rang gi rnam pa'i gzugs brnyan can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa bsams nas /
analyzed: sna bug g-yon du rab tu zhugs nas lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du rang gi rnam pa'i gzugs brnyan can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa bsams nas /
translated: Having entered the left nostril, they become a moon mandala in the navel mandala, having the form of one's own image.

original: skad cig gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um yig bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: skad cig gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um yig bsam par bya'o //
translated: Instantly, one should imagine the syllable Hum on the moon mandala.

original: de nas zla ba dang sa bon yongs su gyur pas bcom ldan 'das sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang thod pa 'dzin pa'i phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig ma phag mo dmar po 'khyud pa nam mkha'i ri mo
analyzed: de nas zla ba dang sa bon yongs su gyur pas bcom ldan 'das sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang thod pa 'dzin pa'i phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig ma phag mo dmar po 'khyud pa nam mkha'i ri mo
translated: Then, the moon and seed syllable transform completely into the Bhagavat, white in color, holding a vajra and a bell, embracing the red VƒÅrƒÅhƒ´, who holds a vajra and a skull filled with blood in her two hands, with one face, looking like a drawing in the sky.

original: bzhin du bltas la sgyu ma lta bu'i shin tu dga' ba'i sgras kun nas drangs pa'i khams gsum dang dkyil 'khor rang la rim pas bstim par bya'o //
analyzed: bzhin du bltas la sgyu ma lta bu'i shin tu dga' ba'i sgras kun nas drangs pa'i khams gsum dang dkyil 'khor rang la rim pas bstim par bya'o //
translated: Looking at her, one is drawn by the sound of the extremely joyful illusion-like [union], and the three realms and the ma·πá·∏çala gradually dissolve into oneself.

original: rim pa yang srid pa ni snod dang bcud mtha' dag ste dur khrod rnams la'o //
analyzed: rim pa yang srid pa ni snod dang bcud mtha' dag ste dur khrod rnams la'o //
translated: The stages are as follows: Existence is the entire universe and inhabitants, which dissolve into the charnel grounds.

original: dur khrod rnams kyang srung ba'i phyi'i 'khor lo la'o //üîΩsrung ba'i 'khor lo sku'i 'khor lo la //
analyzed: dur khrod rnams kyang srung ba'i phyi'i 'khor lo la'o // srung ba'i 'khor lo sku'i 'khor lo la //
translated: The charnel grounds dissolve into the outer wheel of protection.üîΩThe wheel of protection dissolves into the wheel of body.

original: sku'i 'khor lo gsung gi 'khor lo la //
analyzed: sku'i 'khor lo gsung gi 'khor lo la //
translated: The wheel of body dissolves into the wheel of speech.

original: gsung gi 'khor lo thugs kyi 'khor lo la //
analyzed: gsung gi 'khor lo thugs kyi 'khor lo la //
translated: The wheel of speech dissolves into the wheel of mind.

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor te de la thugs kyi 'khor lo'i phyogs su gnas pa rnams mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor te de la thugs kyi 'khor lo'i phyogs su gnas pa rnams mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams la'o //
translated: In the heart cakra, the great-bliss cakra, the heart-cakra-quarter deities, the dakinis and so forth,

original: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su gnas pa rnams gzugs ma la sogs pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su gnas pa rnams gzugs ma la sogs pa rnams la'o //
translated: and the dakinis and so forth in the northeast and so forth,

original: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal rnams la'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal rnams la'o //
translated: dissolve into the faces of the Bhagavat.

original: rdo rje phag mo dang sdom pa dag lte ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje phag mo dang sdom pa dag la rab tu thim par bsam mo //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo dang sdom pa dag lte ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje phag mo dang sdom pa dag la rab tu thim par bsam mo //
translated: Vajravarahi and Samvara, who are in the navel, dissolve into the Vajravarahi and Samvara in the heart.

original: de dag rdo rje phag mo dang sdom pa yang dga' ba mnyam pa'i bde ba chen pos 'dod chags chen pos @299a * //üîΩzhu bar gyur te /
analyzed: de dag rdo rje phag mo dang sdom pa yang dga' ba mnyam pa'i bde ba chen pos 'dod chags chen pos @299a * // zhu bar gyur te /
translated: Those two Vajravarahi and Samvara, with the great bliss of equal joy, melt into great passion.

original: zhu ba de yongs su gyur pa sindh'u ras byugs pa'i mu tig ltar h'um yig bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du bsam par bya'o //üîΩde nas a'u yig ha yig la /
analyzed: zhu ba de yongs su gyur pa sindh'u ras byugs pa'i mu tig ltar h'um yig bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du bsam par bya'o // de nas a'u yig ha yig la /
translated: That melting is transformed into the syllable hum, the nature of great bliss, like a pearl smeared with sindhura.

original: ha yig mgo la /
analyzed: ha yig mgo la /
translated: Then, the syllable au and the syllable haüîΩdissolve into the head of the syllable ha.

original: mgo bo zla phyed lo /
analyzed: mgo bo zla phyed lo /
translated: The head is the half-moon.

original: zla phyod thig le la /
analyzed: zla phyod thig le la /
translated: The half-moon is the bindu.

original: thig le n'a da la rim pas rab tu thim pa bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: thig le n'a da la rim pas rab tu thim pa bsam par bya'o //
translated: The bindu gradually dissolves into the nada.

original: n'a da tsam skra'i rtse mo brgya stong gi tshul du lus par blta'o //
analyzed: n'a da tsam skra'i rtse mo brgya stong gi tshul du lus par blta'o //
translated: The nada is seen as the size of one hundred or one thousand hair tips.

original: rab kyis de yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab kyis de yang mi dmigs so //
translated: The best [meditators] do not even observe that.

original: yang na lte ba'i padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba kha sbyor ba'i nang na yod pa'i sa bon h'um las byung ba'i padma'i rtsa lag ltar 'od zer gyi ri mo la sems rten par byed pa'i sgo nas /
analyzed: yang na lte ba'i padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba kha sbyor ba'i nang na yod pa'i sa bon h'um las byung ba'i padma'i rtsa lag ltar 'od zer gyi ri mo la sems rten par byed pa'i sgo nas /
translated: Alternatively, one should focus the mind on the light rays of the lotus that arises from the seed syllable h≈´·πÉ, which is located in the center of the sun and moon that are in union in the navel.

original: rtsa gnyis la srog rlung gi rgyu ba spangs nas /
analyzed: rtsa gnyis la srog rlung gi rgyu ba spangs nas /
translated: Having abandoned the movement of the life vƒÅyu in the two nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s,üîΩsince it enters the central nƒÅ·∏çƒ´, the fire of passion blazes. The moon at the crown melts and, through the process of pervading the cakras, the special divisions of joy arise.

original: dbus ma la rab tu 'jug pas gtum mo sbar ba las spyi bo'i zla ba zhu nas 'khor lo la khyab pa'i rim pas dga' ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba'i khyad par gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba byung nas rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pas
analyzed: dbus ma la rab tu 'jug pas gtum mo sbar ba las spyi bo'i zla ba zhu nas 'khor lo la khyab pa'i rim pas dga' ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba'i khyad par gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba byung nas rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pas
translated: Since the connate joy arises and all concepts are abandoned,

original: dus gcig tu dkyil 'khor mi dmigs par bya ba'am /
analyzed: dus gcig tu dkyil 'khor mi dmigs par bya ba'am /
translated: At one time, the ma·πá·∏çala is made invisible,

original: rim pas stong pa nyid du bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: rim pas stong pa nyid du bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: or it is gathered into emptiness in stages.

original: rim pa yang sngar kho na'o //
analyzed: rim pa yang sngar kho na'o //
translated: The stages are the same as before.

original: de ltar skad cig re rer rab tu 'jug pa dang ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar skad cig re rer rab tu 'jug pa dang ldan par bya'o //
translated: In this way, one should engage in the instant.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: ji ltar dbugs rlung me long la //
analyzed: ji ltar dbugs rlung me long la //
translated: Just as the breath wind

original: kun du sim nas 'gro ba nyid //
analyzed: kun du sim nas 'gro ba nyid //
translated: fully enters and goes out in a mirror,

original: de bzhin rnal 'byor yang dag mthar //
analyzed: de bzhin rnal 'byor yang dag mthar //
translated: in the same way, the yogi

original: skad cig re rer rab tu 'jug / ces so //
analyzed: skad cig re rer rab tu 'jug / ces so //
translated: instantly engages in the perfect end.üîΩAlso, through the repeated engagements and emergences, the yogi actualizes the yoga of the samƒÅdhi of the union of the perfection of the nondifference of the two truths.

original: yang dang yang du 'jug pa dang ldang ba rnams kyis kyang bden pa gnyis tha mi dad pa rdzogs pa zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnal 'byor mngon sum du byed pa'o zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po rdzogs so /
analyzed: yang dang yang du 'jug pa dang ldang ba rnams kyis kyang bden pa gnyis tha mi dad pa rdzogs pa zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnal 'byor mngon sum du byed pa'o zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po rdzogs so /
translated: The great yoga is complete.

original: // / de ltar man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du sgrub thabs bshad nas sgrub thabs 'di kho na bskyed pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pas man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par 'byed de /
analyzed: // / de ltar man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du sgrub thabs bshad nas sgrub thabs 'di kho na bskyed pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pas man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par 'byed de /
translated: Having explained the means of achievement in accordance with the instructions, he analyzes the means of achievement in accordance with the instructions of the creation and perfection stages.

original: de la shin tu rnal 'byor ma'i mtha'i bar ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de la shin tu rnal 'byor ma'i mtha'i bar ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: Therein, the stage of creation is up to the very subtle yoga.

original: rnal 'byor chen po ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste /
translated: The great yoga is the perfection stage.

original: bskyed pa dang rdzogs rim 'di gnyis ni /
analyzed: bskyed pa dang rdzogs rim 'di gnyis ni /
translated: These two, the creation and perfection stages,

original: rigs pas sgrubs pa'i yan lag drug pa'i go rims kho nas bsam gtan bya'o //
analyzed: rigs pas sgrubs pa'i yan lag drug pa'i go rims kho nas bsam gtan bya'o //
translated: should be contemplated in the sequence of the six-branched yoga alone.

original: gzhan du na yang dag pa'i sgrub pa thob par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na yang dag pa'i sgrub pa thob par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, one will not attain the perfect achievement.

original: de bzhin @299b du gsungs pa yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud phyi ma las /üîΩbsnyen dang yan lag drug sbyor bas //
analyzed: de bzhin @299b du gsungs pa yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud phyi ma las / bsnyen dang yan lag drug sbyor bas //
translated: Thus it is said, in the glorious Guhyasamaja Tantra Continuation:üîΩHaving performed the supreme achievement

original: grub pa'i mchog ni byas nas su //
analyzed: grub pa'i mchog ni byas nas su //
translated: through the means of the approximation and the six-branched yoga,

original: bsgrub par bya'o gzhan du na //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya'o gzhan du na //
translated: one should achieve it; otherwise,

original: grub pa'i mchog ni mi thob bo //
analyzed: grub pa'i mchog ni mi thob bo //
translated: one will not attain the supreme achievement.

original: zhes so // so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang // srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang // rjes su dran dang ting nge 'dzin //
analyzed: zhes so // so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang // srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang // rjes su dran dang ting nge 'dzin //
translated: recollection, and meditative concentration,

original: sbyor ba yan lag drug tu 'dod //
analyzed: sbyor ba yan lag drug tu 'dod //
translated: are considered the six-branched yoga.

original: ces bya ba de la mig la sogs pa'i 'grel ba can rnam par shes pa lnga rnams gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams las so sor sdud pa ni bkug nas yang dag par dul bar byed pa gang de so sor bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba de la mig la sogs pa'i 'grel ba can rnam par shes pa lnga rnams gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams las so sor sdud pa ni bkug nas yang dag par dul bar byed pa gang de so sor bsdus pa'o //
translated: Among them, the five consciousnesses such as eye consciousness are withdrawn from their objects such as form, and having been drawn in, are perfectly controlled. That is withdrawal.

original: yang na lha nyid kyi tshul du yul gzung ba ni so sor sdud pa'o //
analyzed: yang na lha nyid kyi tshul du yul gzung ba ni so sor sdud pa'o //
translated: Or, the apprehension of objects in the form of deities is withdrawal.

original: bsam gtan so sor sdud pa'i go rims kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa lha nyid du bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan so sor sdud pa'i go rims kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa lha nyid du bsgom pa'o //
translated: Contemplation is the cultivation of the mental consciousness in the form of a deity by the sequence of withdrawal.

original: de yang rnam par rtog pa rnam par dpyod pa dga' ba bde ba sems rtse gcig pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: de yang rnam par rtog pa rnam par dpyod pa dga' ba bde ba sems rtse gcig pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: That is of five kinds, distinguished as the joys of the analysis of conceptualization, bliss, and one-pointed mind.

original: de la snod dang bcud kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das dpal sdom pa'i yongs su brtag pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa ste /
analyzed: de la snod dang bcud kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das dpal sdom pa'i yongs su brtag pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa ste /
translated: The imagination of the ma·πá·∏çala of the vessel and its contents, together with the BhagavƒÅn, the glorious Samvara, is the investigation.

original: de kho na la bstan pa nyid kyis nges pa ni rnam par dpyod pa'o //üîΩrnam par dpyod pas de dang de'i lha nyid du dmigs pas yid bde ba de ni dga' ba'o //
analyzed: de kho na la bstan pa nyid kyis nges pa ni rnam par dpyod pa'o // rnam par dpyod pas de dang de'i lha nyid du dmigs pas yid bde ba de ni dga' ba'o //
translated: The ascertainment of that very [imagination] by the teaching is the analysis.üîΩThe mental satisfaction that is the observation of that very deity by the analysis is the joy.
