original: /'dzin pa 'di'i mjug thogs su bar ma chad par smig rgyu du ba srin bu me khyer mar me sprin med pa'i nam mkha' lta bu'i rtags lnga mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: /'dzin pa 'di'i mjug thogs su bar ma chad par smig rgyu du ba srin bu me khyer mar me sprin med pa'i nam mkha' lta bu'i rtags lnga mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Immediately after this retention, without interruption, the five signs‚Äîlike a mirage, smoke, a firefly, a butter lamp, and a cloudless sky‚Äîare seen.

original: de nas srog rtsol dang lhan cig tu 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis gang gi tshe sems brtan par gyur pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de nas srog rtsol dang lhan cig tu 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis gang gi tshe sems brtan par gyur pa de'i tshe /
translated: Then, when the mind becomes stable by the nature of clear light together with pranayama,üîΩat that time, by the power of the aspiration prayers, recollection of the deity first meditated upon arises.

original: smon @301b lam gyis rab tu 'byed pa'i mthus dang po bsgoms pa'i lha la rjes su dran pa 'byung ba de la yang bsgoms pa'i a'a li k'a li la sogs pa'i phra ba'i sbyor ba las sgom pa pos 'od zer sgros par byas pa 'di ni rjes su
analyzed: smon @301b lam gyis rab tu 'byed pa'i mthus dang po bsgoms pa'i lha la rjes su dran pa 'byung ba de la yang bsgoms pa'i a'a li k'a li la sogs pa'i phra ba'i sbyor ba las sgom pa pos 'od zer sgros par byas pa 'di ni rjes su
translated: Also, in that, the meditator radiates light rays from the subtle yoga of the ali and kali meditations and so on. This is recollection.

original: dran pa'o // 'od de dang bcas pa ba slu'i bu ga re re rnams kyis phung po khams dang skye mched la sogs pa lha'i rang bzhin spros pa ni rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa can yin no //
analyzed: dran pa'o // 'od de dang bcas pa ba slu'i bu ga re re rnams kyis phung po khams dang skye mched la sogs pa lha'i rang bzhin spros pa ni rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa can yin no //
translated: The light together with that radiates from each pore of the body, and the aggregates, constituents, sense bases, and so on are emanated in the nature of the deity. This is called recollection. This is the intention.

original: de bzhin du dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las /
analyzed: de bzhin du dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las /
translated: Similarly, in the Shri Guhyasamaja Tantra, it states:

original: brtan pa'i rin chen spro bar byed //
analyzed: brtan pa'i rin chen spro bar byed //
translated: The stable ones emanate the jewels.

original: mi brtan pas na spro mi bya //
analyzed: mi brtan pas na spro mi bya //
translated: The unstable ones do not emanate.

original: rab mchog sprin rnams kyis spro bya //
analyzed: rab mchog sprin rnams kyis spro bya //
translated: The supreme ones emanate the clouds.

original: sangs rgyas ye shes mnyam 'od kyis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ye shes mnyam 'od kyis //
translated: and Buddhajnana, and Samantaprabha.

original: zhes bya'o // de nas phung po khams dang skye mched la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis spros pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi lha rnams 'od kyi rang bzhin du byas nas 'od zer rnams kyang gsungs pa'i sbyor ba rnams las rgyud tha dad pa'i phyir sgrub thabs mi
analyzed: zhes bya'o // de nas phung po khams dang skye mched la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis spros pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi lha rnams 'od kyi rang bzhin du byas nas 'od zer rnams kyang gsungs pa'i sbyor ba rnams las rgyud tha dad pa'i phyir sgrub thabs mi
translated: Then, having made the deities of the nature of all things with conceptual elaboration, such as the aggregates, elements, sense bases, etc., into the nature of light, and having also made the light rays into the nature of the deity, one should meditate on the deity of one's own sadhana, because the light rays are of a different continuum from the light rays of the spoken yoga.üîΩHaving rolled up the deity into the nature of indivisible voidness and compassion, one should meditate on the subtle yoga of any one of the deities.

original: gcig pas bsgoms pa'i gang yang rung ba'i phra ba'i sbyor ba la stod pa dang snying rje dbyer mi phyed pa'i rang bzhin la 'gril pa'i tshul du bsdus nas skad cig gis rang rig pa'i ye shes 'byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: gcig pas bsgoms pa'i gang yang rung ba'i phra ba'i sbyor ba la stod pa dang snying rje dbyer mi phyed pa'i rang bzhin la 'gril pa'i tshul du bsdus nas skad cig gis rang rig pa'i ye shes 'byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: This is the samadhi.

original: 'di kho na rgyud gzhan nas 'byung ba dang / brgyud pa'i rim pa las byung ba'i bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di kho na rgyud gzhan nas 'byung ba dang / brgyud pa'i rim pa las byung ba'i bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation that comes from other tantras and from the lineage.

original: 'od gsal las ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi skus zhes pa de yang ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba yang 'ga' zhig tu bshad do //
analyzed: 'od gsal las ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi skus zhes pa de yang ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba yang 'ga' zhig tu bshad do //
translated: Also, from clear light, by means of the body of the nature of exalted wisdom is explained in some places as concentration.

original: dpal gsad ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi mar yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpal gsad ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi mar yang gsungs pa /
translated: Also, the Later Guhyasamaja Tantra says:

original: bcu po dbang po rnams kyi ni //
analyzed: bcu po dbang po rnams kyi ni //
translated: The ten faculties

original: rab 'jug gnas pa thams cad du //
analyzed: rab 'jug gnas pa thams cad du //
translated: are fully engaged in all states

original: so sor sdud pa zhes brjod de //üîΩ'dod pa'i bsdus pa so so'o //
analyzed: so sor sdud pa zhes brjod de // 'dod pa'i bsdus pa so so'o //
translated: and are called withdrawal,üîΩ the individual withdrawal of the five objects of desire.

original: 'dod pa lnga rnams bsdus pa yis //
analyzed: 'dod pa lnga rnams bsdus pa yis //
translated: By the withdrawal of the five objects of desire,

original: sangs rgyas lnga ni rab sbyor bas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga ni rab sbyor bas /
translated: the five buddhas are fully engaged.

original: brtags pa bsam gtan du brjod de //üîΩbsam gtan rnam pa ldar 'gyur te //
analyzed: brtags pa bsam gtan du brjod de // bsam gtan rnam pa ldar 'gyur te //
translated: This is called imagined concentration,üîΩ which is of four types.üîΩIt is said that the four concentrations are

original: rnam par rtog dang rnam par dpyod //
analyzed: rnam par rtog dang rnam par dpyod //
translated: contemplation, analysis,üîΩjoy, and likewise bliss,

original: dga' dang de bzhin bde ba dang // sems kyi rtse gcig nyid dang ni //
analyzed: dga' dang de bzhin bde ba dang // sems kyi rtse gcig nyid dang ni //
translated: and one-pointedness of mind.

original: lnga po 'di rnams bsam gtan bsdus //
analyzed: lnga po 'di rnams bsam gtan bsdus //
translated: These five are the concentration of withdrawal.

original: gsang rgyud sku rnams thams cad la //
analyzed: gsang rgyud sku rnams thams cad la //
translated: In all the bodies of the secret tantras

original: rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su grags //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su grags //
translated: the various are well known.

original: gsang gsum 'byung ba rtog pa yin //
analyzed: gsang gsum 'byung ba rtog pa yin //
translated: The arising of the three secrets is imagination.

original: rnam dpyod yongs su de longs spyod //
analyzed: rnam dpyod yongs su de longs spyod //
translated: The enjoyment of the complete analysis is the third.

original: gsum pa yid bde dga' ba ste //
analyzed: gsum pa yid bde dga' ba ste //
translated: The third is the joy of mental bliss.

original: bzhi pa bde bas bsdus @302a * //
analyzed: bzhi pa bde bas bsdus @302a * //
translated: The fourth is the bliss of the mind.

original: pa'o ; / sems kyi lnga pa shes par bya //
analyzed: pa'o ; / sems kyi lnga pa shes par bya //
translated: The fifth of the mind should be known.

original: shes dang shes bya'i skye ba nyams //
analyzed: shes dang shes bya'i skye ba nyams //
translated: The arising of the knower and the known is destroyed.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad rang bzhin zhi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad rang bzhin zhi //
translated: All buddhas are the nature of peace.

original: thams cad 'dod pa so sor gnas //üîΩye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs //
analyzed: thams cad 'dod pa so sor gnas // ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs //
translated: All desires abide individually.üîΩThe breath is the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid //
translated: The nature of the five elements

original: 'gril ba'i tshul gyis phab nas su ;
analyzed: 'gril ba'i tshul gyis phab nas su ;
translated: is brought down in the manner of gathering

original: / sna yi rtse mor rab rtog bya //
analyzed: / sna yi rtse mor rab rtog bya //
translated: and is well known at the tip of the nose.

original: kha dog lnga ldan rin chen che //
analyzed: kha dog lnga ldan rin chen che //
translated: The great jewel has five colors.

original: srog rtsol zhes bya dran pa yin //
analyzed: srog rtsol zhes bya dran pa yin //
translated: The prƒÅ·πáa is called mindfulness.

original: rang sngags snying gar bsams nas ni //
analyzed: rang sngags snying gar bsams nas ni //
translated: Having visualized one‚Äôs mantra at the heart,üîΩthe prƒÅ·πáa is placed in the bindu.

original: srog ni thig ler gyur par gzhag / rang dbang rin chen dgag pa yi //
analyzed: srog ni thig ler gyur par gzhag / rang dbang rin chen dgag pa yi //
translated: The jewel of self-control is blocked.

original: gzung ba 'dzin pa yin par bshad //üîΩ'gog pa'i rdo rje gnas sems la //
analyzed: gzung ba 'dzin pa yin par bshad // 'gog pa'i rdo rje gnas sems la //
translated: The retention of the object is explained.üîΩThe sign of the arising of the element

original: rtags kyi 'byung ba rab tu skyo //
analyzed: rtags kyi 'byung ba rab tu skyo //
translated: arises in the mind that abides in the place of the vajra of cessation.

original: de yi rtags kyang rnam pa lnga //
analyzed: de yi rtags kyang rnam pa lnga //
translated: The sign is also fivefold.

original: byang chub rdo rje las byung ba //
analyzed: byang chub rdo rje las byung ba //
translated: Arisen from the vajra of enlightenment,

original: dang po smig rgyu'i rnam pa can //
analyzed: dang po smig rgyu'i rnam pa can //
translated: The first is like a mirage,

original: du ba'i rnam pa gnyis pa ste //
analyzed: du ba'i rnam pa gnyis pa ste //
translated: The second is like smoke,

original: gsum pa srin bu me khyer bzhin //
analyzed: gsum pa srin bu me khyer bzhin //
translated: The third is like a firefly,

original: bzhi pa mar mes gsal byed pa //
analyzed: bzhi pa mar mes gsal byed pa //
translated: The fourth is like a flame,

original: lnga brtag tu gsal byed de //
analyzed: lnga brtag tu gsal byed de //
translated: The fifth is like the sun,

original: sprin med nam mkha' lta bu'o //
analyzed: sprin med nam mkha' lta bu'o //
translated: And the sixth is like the cloudless sky.

original: brtan pa rdo rje'i lam gyis su //
analyzed: brtan pa rdo rje'i lam gyis su //
translated: By the path of the firm vajra,

original: nam mkha'i khams la dgram par bya //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams la dgram par bya //
translated: One should spread them in the realm of space.

original: bsgoms nas rjes su dran pa gang //
analyzed: bsgoms nas rjes su dran pa gang //
translated: Having meditated, whatever is recollected,

original: de yi rnam par can yang dgram //
analyzed: de yi rnam par can yang dgram //
translated: One should spread its forms.

original: rjes su dran zhes shes par bya //
analyzed: rjes su dran zhes shes par bya //
translated: One should understand that as recollection.

original: de la rab tu gsal bar skye //
analyzed: de la rab tu gsal bar skye //
translated: That arises as very clear.

original: shes rab thabs dang snyoms zhugs pas //
analyzed: shes rab thabs dang snyoms zhugs pas //
translated: By engaging in the union of wisdom and method,

original: thams cad dngos po thams cad du //
analyzed: thams cad dngos po thams cad du //
translated: All things are gathered

original: 'gril ba'i tshul gyis bsdus nas ni //
analyzed: 'gril ba'i tshul gyis bsdus nas ni //
translated: In the manner of being rolled up

original: thig le'i dbus su rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: thig le'i dbus su rnam par bsgom //
translated: And meditated on in the center of the bindu.

original: skad cig yi shes rdzogs pa ni //
analyzed: skad cig yi shes rdzogs pa ni //
translated: The complete knowledge in an instant

original: ting nge 'dzin zhes ming can no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin zhes ming can no //
translated: Is called ‚ÄúsamƒÅdhi.‚Äù

original: tshig le'ur byas pa 'di rnams las rtogs par dka' ba'i tshig rnam par bshad de /
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas pa 'di rnams las rtogs par dka' ba'i tshig rnam par bshad de /
translated: These verses are difficult to understand, so they are explained.

original: bcu po zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga dang / gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: bcu po zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga dang / gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams kyi'o //
translated: The ten are those of the five faculties such as the eye, and those of the five objects such as form.

original: de'i phyir 'di kho na gsungs te /üîΩdbang po rnams kyi rang 'jug gnas //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di kho na gsungs te / dbang po rnams kyi rang 'jug gnas //
translated: Therefore, this is said:

original: zhes pa'o // dbang po rnams ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // dbang po rnams ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams so //
translated: The faculties are the five faculties such as the eye,üîΩand the five objects such as form.üîΩThe five faculties are the eye and so on.

original: yang rang 'jug par gnas pa ni rang rang gi yul la 'jug pa ni rab tu 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: yang rang 'jug par gnas pa ni rang rang gi yul la 'jug pa ni rab tu 'jug pa ste /
translated: Moreover, they are engaged in their own objects, and that is their engagement.

original: rang gi 'jug pa la gnas pa'i phyir rang 'jug gnas pa ni mig la sogs pa'i shes pa lnga zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi 'jug pa la gnas pa'i phyir rang 'jug gnas pa ni mig la sogs pa'i shes pa lnga zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because they abide in their own engagement, they are engaged in their own abiding. The meaning of the five consciousnesses such as the eye is that.

original: 'di yang bsdus pa so so zhes ba ni //
analyzed: 'di yang bsdus pa so so zhes ba ni //
translated: This is also the individual collections.

original: 'dod par byed pa ni @302b mngon par zhen par byed pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i yul lnga ste /
analyzed: 'dod par byed pa ni @302b mngon par zhen par byed pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i yul lnga ste /
translated: The five objects such as form and sound are desired because they are objects of desire.

original: de rnams las gzugs la sogs pa'i shes pa lnga rim pa bzhin du sdud ba ni 'gugs par byed pa'i phyir sdud pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams las gzugs la sogs pa'i shes pa lnga rim pa bzhin du sdud ba ni 'gugs par byed pa'i phyir sdud pa ste /
translated: Among those, the five consciousnesses of form and so on are respectively included in the five aggregates, because they are the agents of inclusion.

original: yul dang bral ba'i yid ni 'dod pa'i bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: yul dang bral ba'i yid ni 'dod pa'i bsdus pa'o //
translated: The mind that is free from objects is included in the aggregate of desire.

original: de la so so zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i bsdus pa thob nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la so so zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i bsdus pa thob nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: There, ‚Äúindividually‚Äù means that after attaining the inclusion of desire, that is the meaning.

original: rang 'jug pa'i gnas gang shes pa lnga de kho na rim gyis rang 'jug pa dang bral zhing so sor sdud par brjod do //
analyzed: rang 'jug pa'i gnas gang shes pa lnga de kho na rim gyis rang 'jug pa dang bral zhing so sor sdud par brjod do //
translated: The place of one‚Äôs own engagement is the five consciousnesses. That is the very stage of one‚Äôs own engagement. Free from individually included, it is said to be withdrawal.

original: 'dod pa lnga rnams ni yul lnga ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa lnga rnams ni yul lnga ste /
translated: The five objects are the five objects.üîΩThose are fully conceptualized in the manner of the deity.

original: de rnams la lha'i tshul gyis yongs su rtog bzhes nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te /
analyzed: de rnams la lha'i tshul gyis yongs su rtog bzhes nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te /
translated: It is merely an illustration.

original: thams cad nang gi phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams dpal bde mchog la sogs pa'i lha nyid kyi rab tu sbyor bas yongs su rtogs pa yang bsam gtan no //
analyzed: thams cad nang gi phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams dpal bde mchog la sogs pa'i lha nyid kyi rab tu sbyor bas yongs su rtogs pa yang bsam gtan no //
translated: All the internal aggregates, elements, and sense bases are the deity of ≈örƒ´ Heruka and so on. The full understanding by the application of that is meditative concentration.

original: yid kyi dbang po dang de'i rnam par shes pa dag ni sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i bdag nyid lha rnams gsal ba'i tshul du byung ba ni gsang gsum dbyung ste /üîΩde kho na rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi dbang po dang de'i rnam par shes pa dag ni sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i bdag nyid lha rnams gsal ba'i tshul du byung ba ni gsang gsum dbyung ste / de kho na rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: This is the emergence of the three secrets.

original: shes dang shes bya'i skye ba nyams //
analyzed: shes dang shes bya'i skye ba nyams //
translated: The arising of consciousness and the object of consciousness is destroyed.

original: zhes pa ni log pa'i kun rdzob kyi ngang tshul can shes pa dang shes bya'i rnam par rtog pa'i skye ba med do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni log pa'i kun rdzob kyi ngang tshul can shes pa dang shes bya'i rnam par rtog pa'i skye ba med do //
translated: This is the nature of the false superficial reality. The arising of the conceptualization of consciousness and the object of consciousness does not exist.

original: rin chen che ba zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i mchog sbyin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rin chen che ba zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i mchog sbyin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The great jewel is the giver of the supreme result.

original: 'gog pa'i rdo rje ni 'od gsal ba ste de la gnas pa'i sems ni de'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i rdo rje ni 'od gsal ba ste de la gnas pa'i sems ni de'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'o //
translated: The vajra of cessation is clear light. The mind that abides in that is transformed into its nature.

original: brtan pa rdo rje'i lam gyis su //
analyzed: brtan pa rdo rje'i lam gyis su //
translated: By the path of the firm vajra

original: nam mkha'i khams la dgram par bya //üîΩzhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams la dgram par bya // zhes bya ba ni //
translated: one should spread throughout the realm of space.

original: brtan zhing rdo rje'i lam gyis rjes su dran pas nam mkha'i khams rnams su dgram par bya ste /
analyzed: brtan zhing rdo rje'i lam gyis rjes su dran pas nam mkha'i khams rnams su dgram par bya ste /
translated: By the path of the firm vajra, one should spread throughout the realms of space by means of recollection.

original: phung po khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin 'od zer dang ldan pa'i lha tshogs rnams so //
analyzed: phung po khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin 'od zer dang ldan pa'i lha tshogs rnams so //
translated: The hosts of deities endowed with light rays, which have the nature of the aggregates, elements, and sense bases.

original: shes rab thabs dang snyoms 'jug pas //
analyzed: shes rab thabs dang snyoms 'jug pas //
translated: By the union of wisdom and means,

original: thams cad dngos po thams cad du //
analyzed: thams cad dngos po thams cad du //
translated: all things in all ways

original: zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang thabs snyoms par 'jug pa ni stong nyid snying rje tha mi dad pa'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang thabs snyoms par 'jug pa ni stong nyid snying rje tha mi dad pa'i tshul gyis so //
translated: The union of wisdom and means is by the method of the non-differentiation of emptiness and compassion.

original: thams cad dngos po zhes bya ba ni phung po khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin 'od zer dang bcas pa'i lha nyid tshogs rnams so //üîΩ'gril ba'i tshul gyis zhes pa ni stong pa dang snying rje tha mi dad pa'i tshul gyis de rnams rang gi lus la bsgoms pa gang yang rung ba'i thig le'i dbus su nye bar bsdus nas thig le de kho @303a * //
analyzed: thams cad dngos po zhes bya ba ni phung po khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin 'od zer dang bcas pa'i lha nyid tshogs rnams so // 'gril ba'i tshul gyis zhes pa ni stong pa dang snying rje tha mi dad pa'i tshul gyis de rnams rang gi lus la bsgoms pa gang yang rung ba'i thig le'i dbus su nye bar bsdus nas thig le de kho @303a * //
translated: All things means the hosts of deities endowed with light rays, which have the nature of the aggregates, elements, and sense bases.

original: na bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: na bsgom par bya'o //
translated: By the method of gathering means that by the method of the non-differentiation of emptiness and compassion, having gathered them all into the center of any suitable bindu in one's body, one should meditate on that bindu.

original: thig le zhes bya bar nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: thig le zhes bya bar nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: The term bindu is used as an illustration.

original: rim pa 'di bzhin du a'a li k'a li'i sbyor ba la sogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: rim pa 'di bzhin du a'a li k'a li'i sbyor ba la sogs pa yang ngo //
translated: In the same order, the union of Alikali, etc.

original: skad cig ye shes rdzogs pa ni //
analyzed: skad cig ye shes rdzogs pa ni //
translated: The perfection of knowledge in an instant

original: zhes bya ba skad cig gis rang rig skye bas byed ba de kho na nyid mthong ba yang ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba skad cig gis rang rig skye bas byed ba de kho na nyid mthong ba yang ngo //

original: bye brag tu gang gi tshe yang 'di smin ma dang gi dbus su so sor sdud pa'i go rims kyis thig le bsgoms pa de'i tshe yang srog rtsol dang 'dzin pa dang rjes su dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ngo //

translated: The glorious guru, the great compassionate one, the supreme great being, thinking that he was a suitable vessel, gave him his own realization to the great pa·πá·∏çita ≈örƒ´ ≈öƒÅntabhadra.

original: skyon med cing brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi dpal bla ma de las pandi ta chen po chos kyi 'byung gnas zhi bas zhus so //
analyzed: skyon med cing brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi dpal bla ma de las pandi ta chen po chos kyi 'byung gnas zhi bas zhus so //

original: de la yang grags pa'i lhas zhus /
analyzed: de la yang grags pa'i lhas zhus /

original: de la pandi ta chen po chos 'phags kyis zhus /
analyzed: de la pandi ta chen po chos 'phags kyis zhus /

original: nyan thos phyi rol yod par smra //
analyzed: nyan thos phyi rol yod par smra //
translated: The Shravakas say external objects exist.

original: rnal 'byor spyod bas sems rang bzhin //
analyzed: rnal 'byor spyod bas sems rang bzhin //

original: 'gro ba stong pa dbu ma bas //
analyzed: 'gro ba stong pa dbu ma bas //
translated: The Madhyamikas say beings are empty.

original: gsang sngags pa yang 'od gsal bzhed //üîΩkha cig yul rnams spangs nas te //
analyzed: gsang sngags pa yang 'od gsal bzhed // kha cig yul rnams spangs nas te //

original: 'ga' zhig yul rnams dgag byas pa //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig yul rnams dgag byas pa //
translated: Some negate objects.

original: kha cig yul rnams nyid kho nas //
analyzed: kha cig yul rnams nyid kho nas //
translated: Some use objects themselves.

original: mi yi khyu mchog byang chub sgrub //üîΩrtog pa nyams pas blo nyes 'gyur //
analyzed: mi yi khyu mchog byang chub sgrub // rtog pa nyams pas blo nyes 'gyur //
translated: The best of men attain enlightenment.üîΩThe mind is corrupted by impaired imagination.

original: blo ngan 'di ltar rtog par byed //
analyzed: blo ngan 'di ltar rtog par byed //
translated: The evil-minded imagine thus.

original: blo ldan 'di nyid kho na yis //
analyzed: blo ldan 'di nyid kho na yis //
translated: The wise one, by this alone,

original: nam mkha' bas lhag ci yang 'char //
analyzed: nam mkha' bas lhag ci yang 'char //
translated: arises as anything whatsoever, even more than space.

original: zhes dpal sa ra ha pas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes dpal sa ra ha pas gsungs so //

original: ji ltar khyim thab mo ni skyes bu 'phyon ma la /
analyzed: ji ltar khyim thab mo ni skyes bu 'phyon ma la /

original: rjes su chags gyur rang gi khyo la'ang chags pa ltar byed pa //
analyzed: rjes su chags gyur rang gi khyo la'ang chags pa ltar byed pa //

original: de bzhin rnal 'byor rtogs pa'i yul la chags pa yis //
analyzed: de bzhin rnal 'byor rtogs pa'i yul la chags pa yis //
translated: in the same way, the yogi who is attached to the object of realization

original: slar yang yul la longs ni spyod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: slar yang yul la longs ni spyod par byed pa'o //

original: grogs ngan nang nas rnal 'byor gang //
analyzed: grogs ngan nang nas rnal 'byor gang //

analyzed: bstan pa bsrung phyir 'jigs pa yis //

original: bzang po'i spyod pa brtsam bya'i phyir //
analyzed: bzang po'i spyod pa brtsam bya'i phyir //
translated: In order to begin the conduct of the good,

original: de ni sems kyi rnal 'byor rtsom //
analyzed: de ni sems kyi rnal 'byor rtsom //

original: rnyog bcas yid ldan las kyi phyag rgya rab spangs nas //
analyzed: rnyog bcas yid ldan las kyi phyag rgya rab spangs nas //

original: rtog pa las byung ye shes phyag rgya ni //
analyzed: rtog pa las byung ye shes phyag rgya ni //
translated: the gnosis mudra that arises from the imaginationüîΩis the supreme for the sake of perfect enlightenment.

original: yang dang rdzogs pa'i byang chub ched du rgyas ba'i mchog / de skyed byed pas phyag rgya mchog de bsgom par bya //
analyzed: yang dang rdzogs pa'i byang chub ched du rgyas ba'i mchog / de skyed byed pas phyag rgya mchog de bsgom par bya //

original: rgyud dang sgrub thabs t'i k'a las //
analyzed: rgyud dang sgrub thabs t'i k'a las //

original: tshig rkang re re rnyed pa gang //
analyzed: tshig rkang re re rnyed pa gang //

original: de rnams bsdus nas yig sna 'di //
analyzed: de rnams bsdus nas yig sna 'di //

original: rang la phan phyin bdag gis byas //
analyzed: rang la phan phyin bdag gis byas //

original: so so skye bo nyid phyir dang // rgyun chags ting @308b 'dzin med ba'i phyir //
analyzed: so so skye bo nyid phyir dang // rgyun chags ting @308b 'dzin med ba'i phyir //

analyzed: 'di la mi gsal mi dag pa //

original: de la mkhas rnams bzod par mdzod //
analyzed: de la mkhas rnams bzod par mdzod //

original: sdom pa 'byung ba'i yig sna 'di //üîΩde bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje yis //
analyzed: sdom pa 'byung ba'i yig sna 'di // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje yis //
translated: This manual of the origin of the vows,

original: byas pa'i dge ba thob pa gang //
analyzed: byas pa'i dge ba thob pa gang //
translated: Whatever virtue is obtained byüîΩThe composition of the Vajradhara

original: de yis skye bo rgyal gyur cig / dpal au rgyan gyi gnas chen po las byung ba /
analyzed: de yis skye bo rgyal gyur cig / dpal au rgyan gyi gnas chen po las byung ba /
translated: May all beings be victorious.

original: dpal bde mchog gi mngon par rtogs pa'i 'grel pa'i t'i k'a khyad par gsal byed ces bya ba pandi ta chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dpal bde mchog gi mngon par rtogs pa'i 'grel pa'i t'i k'a khyad par gsal byed ces bya ba pandi ta chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The tai-ka of the commentary on the clear realization of glorious Heruka, called Clarifying the Special Points, composed by the great pandita Vajradhara, is completed.

original: // / rgya gar shar phyogs dzag ta la'i pandi ta chen po bi bh'u ti tsandras bod yul gyi dbus drang srong srin po'i rir rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o //

translated: The great eastern Indian pandit Vibhutichandra translated this himself in the center of Tibet, on the mountain of the rakshasa sages.
